@Electrical_field_2D/solveLU.m

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 % =====================================================================
00002 %> @brief solveLU performs backward step of Gauss elimination calculates potential distrubutions 
00003 %> using matrix A and many vectors of free elements (boundary conditions)
00004 %>
00005 %> @param m witdh of matrix band
00006 %> @param A  matrix of linear system for potential distribution
00007 %> @param B  vectors with boundary conditions
00008 %>
00009 %> @retval V potential matrix to solve
00010 % =====================================================================
00011 function [V] = solveLU(ef_obj,m,A,B)
00012 
00013 global data_type;
00014 
00015 
00016 % solve upper triangular
00017 n=size(A,1);
00018 V=zeros(n,1,data_type);
00019 
00020 % back step
00021 for i=n:-1:1
00022     sum = 0;
00023     stop = min(i+m,n);
00024     for k=i+1:stop
00025         sum=sum + A(i,k)*V(k);
00026     end;
00027     dif = B(i)-sum;
00028     V(i) = dif/A(i,i);
00029 end;
00030
